title: (solved) How to Create A Discussion on Gameplay
body:
Hi,
I'd like to create a discussion on Gameplay mode, but it says that I need to have at least level 7 since I'm at level 23 now.
How do I solve this issue?

Thanks,

replies.body: Sometimes an account has to sync when they're new to the boards.  It looks like your level is syn'd now so you should be able to post.  Glad to hear all is well now!
It looks this issue has been solved by time!
